newsitem.title: TURKMENISTAN: Turkmen June cotton fibre output doubles mth/mth.
newsitem.headline: Turkmen June cotton fibre output doubles mth/mth.

text.p: Turkmenistan cotton fibre production doubled in June to 1,200 tonnes from 600 tonnes in May, the State Statistics Committee said on Tuesday.
TURKMEN COTTON FIBRE OUTPUT June '97 May '97 Jan-June '97
Around 90 percent of Turkmen cotton fibre is exported to Hong Kong, Switzerland, Sweden, Turkey and Singapore.
